record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 24, 2007
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 24, 2007 -- (House of Representatives - September 20, 2007)

[Page: H10690]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 12:30 p.m. on Monday next for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
